Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sysindexes WHERE id = object_id('w2_Product') and name = 'IX_w2_Product_2') CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_w2_Product_2] ON [dbo].[w2_Product] ( [shop_id] ASC, [product_id] ASC, [display_from] ASC, [display_to] ASC, [display_kbn] ASC, [mobile_disp_flg] ASC, [valid_flg] ASC, [display_only_fixed_purchase_member_flg] ASC, [display_member_rank] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO
